issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: If user limit and/or user limit factor are >100% then the calculated maximum values per user can exceed the maximum for the queue.  For example, maximum AM resource per user could exceed maximum AM resource for the entire queue, or max applications per user could be larger than max applications for the queue.  The per-user values should be capped by the per queue values.
fields.summary: max apps per user can be larger than max per queue

comments.body: Attaching patch that limits the max per user application limit to the max queue application limit. I tested this and saw the change reflected in the UI as well as changing the relevant unit tests.
